name: Bell Pepper
description: Bell pepper, also known as sweet pepper, is a popular fruit-bearing plant that produces large, colorful, and mild-tasting fruits. It is rich in vitamins A, C, and antioxidants, and is widely used in culinary dishes for its sweet and crunchy texture.

environmental_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained, fertile soil rich in organic matter
environmental_requirements.watering_frequency: Regular, moderate watering, ensuring soil stays moist but not waterlogged

visual_characteristics.fruit_color: Green, red, yellow, orange, or purple depending on the variety
